examples.sentence: Jewelry is an excellent gift for big celebrations, such as weddings and anniversaries.
One way to attact new customers is to discount the prices on big holidays.
I decided to put on the new dress I bought last week at my best friend's party.

translations.meaning: phòng để đồ, tủ quần áo

examples.sentence: My closet has no space anymore, but I still couldn't find something to wear tonight.
My sister and I go shopping for new clothes every month.
Look at my new necklace! My parents gave it to me on my eighteenth birthday.
It's cold recently, make sure to wear enought clothes to stay warm all day, or you might get sick.
Check out my new bracelet! I bought it along with my necklace on a discount.
If you get wet, remember to take off your clothes as soon as you get home.
In my school, all students have to wear uniform.
I am waiting my friend to get dressed for tonight's hangout. It has been 30 minutes but he keeps telling me 5 more.

translations.meaning: khiến ai đó cảm thấy thoải mái

examples.sentence: Don't mind what people might think, wear what makes you comfortable.
You don't have to wear expensive clothes for the party. Just wear what makes you comfortable.
My grandmother left me her pair of earrings after she passed away. Unfortunately, I lost one of them.

translations.meaning: ăn mặc lịch sự, phù hợp

examples.sentence: Although she didn't know what was the last night party for, she was very smart dressed for it.
My boss always wears a suit when he goes to meet the clients.
This dress doesn't suit you anymore. It makes you look fat and short.
